pr_title: Fixed missing OpenID Provider session invalidation

timeline.message:
Init fix for OpenID Provider session invalidation

Signed-off-by: Gianluca Barbon <gianluca.barbon@eurotech.com>

Removed again GwtSession from the ShiroSession, added info to the KapuaSession, added field to distinguish user initiated logout in session

Signed-off-by: Gianluca Barbon <gianluca.barbon@eurotech.com>

Removed again GwtSession from the ShiroSession, added info to the KapuaSession, added field to distinguish user initiated logout in session

Signed-off-by: Gianluca Barbon <gianluca.barbon@eurotech.com>

Signed-off-by: Gianluca Barbon <gianluca.barbon@eurotech.com>

Using modified JwtCredentials instead of new method on the AuthenticationService

Signed-off-by: Gianluca Barbon <gianluca.barbon@eurotech.com>
